name: Archaeological Treasure
description:
This game was made for the #WeeklyGameJam 26 - "Mystery Machine"

 You are an archaeologist who found a mysterious mashine. Shortyl after the found you realise, that you can travel between world with this machine! There are hidden platforms which can help you to complete the levels.

It was created using Unity.

Special thanks to moyechi for her help in this challenge!
